item.title: Animals' Home Names: Exploring the Linguistic Bonds Between Humans and Animals in Hindi and English
item.description: In the tapestry of human languages, there exists a rich and intriguing thread connecting us to the animal kingdomâ€”the bestowing of home names upon our cherished companions. [Animals’ Home Names: Exploring the Linguistic Bonds Between Humans and Animals in Hindi and English] delves into this fascinating realm, exploring the myriad ways languages shape our understanding of the bond between humans and animals. Animals’ Home Names: A Tale of Linguistic Bonds Have you ever wondered about the names we give our beloved pets?
